ci_support_linux_64_python3.10.____cpyth:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
fftw:
- '3'
glib:
- '2'
gsl:
- '2.7'
gst_plugins_base:
- '1.26'
gstreamer:
- '1.26'
ldas_tools_framecpp:
- '2.9'
libboost_headers:
- '1.86'
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - c_compiler_version
  - cxx_compiler_version
zlib:
- '1'

about.description:
This package provides a variety of gstreamer elements for
gravitational-wave data analysis and some libraries to help write
such elements.  The code here sits on top of several other libraries,
notably the LIGO Algorithm Library (LAL), FFTW, the GNU Scientific
Library (GSL), and, of course, GStreamer.
This package contains the plugins and shared libraries required to run
gstlal-based applications.
about.summary: GStreamer for GW data analysis (in-development parts)

name: gstlal-ugly

about.description:
This package provides a variety of gstreamer elements for
gravitational-wave data analysis and some libraries to help write
such elements.  The code here sits on top of several other libraries,
notably the LIGO Algorithm Library (LAL), FFTW, the GNU Scientific
Library (GSL), and, of course, GStreamer.
This package contains the plugins and shared libraries required to run
gstlal-based applications.
about.summary: GStreamer for GW data analysis (in-development parts)

raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  name: gstlal-ugly
  version: 1.14.0
  # dependencies
  framecpp_version: 2.6.2
  gds_version: 2.19.0
  gobject_introspection_version: 1.30.0,<1.80.0
  gstlal_version: 1.11.0
  lal_version: 7.2.4
  lalmetaio_version: 3.0.2
  ligo_scald_version: 0.8.0
  ligo_segments_version: 1.4.0
  nds2_version: 0.11.5
  python_ligo_lw_version: 1.8.3

package:
  name: ${{ name|lower }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://software.igwn.org/sources/source/${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 63f10175b779532a55d984724448c4d2b771268d6e91f01095891d0674b1f01c
  patches:
    # update use of imp module in py-compile (autoconf)
    - py-compile-imp.patch

build:
  number: 7
  skip:
    - win
    # gstlal not built for Python 3.13
    - match(python, ">=3.13")

requirements:
  build:
    - ${{ compiler('c') }}
    - ${{ stdlib('c') }}
    - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - make
    - pkg-config >=0.18.0
  host:
    - fftw
    - if: linux
      then:
        - gds-framexmit >=${{ gds_version }}
        - gds-lsmp >=${{ gds_version }}
    - glib
    - gobject-introspection >=${{ gobject_introspection_version }}
    - gsl
    - gstreamer
    - gst-plugins-base
    - gst-python
    - gstlal >=${{ gstlal_version }}
    - ldas-tools-al
    - ldas-tools-framecpp
    - libboost-headers
    - liblal >=${{ lal_version }}
    - liblalmetaio >=${{ lalmetaio_version }}
    - nds2-client >=${{ nds2_version }}
    - python
    - zlib
  run:
    - fftw
    - if: linux
      then:
        - gds-framexmit >=${{ gds_version }}
        - gds-lsmp >=${{ gds_version }}
    - gobject-introspection >=${{ gobject_introspection_version }}
    - gsl
    - gst-plugins-base
    - gst-plugins-good
    - gst-python
    - gstreamer
    - gstlal >=${{ gstlal_version }}
    - h5py
    - ldas-tools-al
    - ldas-tools-framecpp >=${{ framecpp_version }}
    - liblal >=${{ lal_version }}
    - ligo-scald >=${{ ligo_scald_version }}
    - ligo-segments >=${{ ligo_segments_version }}
    - matplotlib-base
    - numpy
    - python
    - python-lal
    - python-lalsimulation
    - python-ligo-lw >=${{ python_ligo_lw_version }}
    - scipy
  ignore_run_exports:
    by_name:
      - gobject-introspection
      - gst-plugins-good
      - gst-python
      - liblalmetaio
      - numpy
    from_package:
      - zlib

tests:
  - requirements:
      run:
        - python-confluent-kafka
    script:
      - gst-inspect-1.0 framecpp
      - if: linux
        then: gst-inspect-1.0 gds
      - gst-inspect-1.0 gstlalugly
      - gst-inspect-1.0 nds
      - "export TMPDIR=$(python -c \"import tempfile; print(tempfile.gettempdir())\")"
      - export GSTLAL_FIR_WHITEN=0
      - gstlal_condor_top --help
      - gstlal_dag_run_time --help
      - gstlal_glitch_population --help
      - gstlal_harmonic_mean_psd --help
      - gstlal_ifo_stat --help
      - gstlal_injsplitter --help
      - gstlal_kafka_dag --help
      - gstlal_ll_dq --help
      - gstlal_ligolw_add_without_reassign --help
      - gstlal_median_of_psds --help
      - gstlal_reduce_dag --help
      - gstlal_segments_operations --help
      - gstlal_segments_trim --help

about:
  summary: GStreamer for GW data analysis (in-development parts)
  description: |
    This package provides a variety of gstreamer elements for
    gravitational-wave data analysis and some libraries to help write
    such elements.  The code here sits on top of several other libraries,
    notably the LIGO Algorithm Library (LAL), FFTW, the GNU Scientific
    Library (GSL), and, of course, GStreamer.
    This package contains the plugins and shared libraries required to run
    gstlal-based applications.
  homepage: https://lscsoft.docs.ligo.org/gstlal/
  repository: https://git.ligo.org/lscsoft/gstlal/
  documentation: https://lscsoft.docs.ligo.org/gstlal/
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  license_file: COPYING

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - duncanmmacleod
    - myNameIsPatrick
